text: shri lankawa saha osteraliyawa athara methek pawathwa athi ekdinatharagawali pahen thunak jayaganimata shri lankawa samathwa athi athara osteraliyawa tharagawali 2 k jaya gena thibe. 2010 wasaredi palamu warata shri lankawa osteraliyawedi ekdina tharagawaliyak jaya ganimata samathwa thibe. 1982 di palamu warata derata muna gasuna ekdina tharagawaliyada shri lankawa jaya ganimata samathwa athi athara 1992 di derata muna gasuna dewani ekdina tharagawaliye jayada shri lankawata himiwa thibe.
